functional_jobs.job_statement: When I visit the website, I want to easily find and view upcoming events, so I can plan my participation in community activities.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the events tab and calendar view on the website.
pain_points: Waitlisted events are not clearly indicated, leading to frustration.
Difficulties in cancelling events once registered.
Overly complex navigation with too many tabs.
desired_outcomes: Clear indication of available spots in events.
Streamlined navigation with fewer, more relevant tabs.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: I can quickly see which events are open for registration and cancel my participation effortlessly.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I use the website, I want to feel reassured that I can participate in community events without hassle, so I can enjoy my experience.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: The current website provides some reassurance but often leads to frustration due to waitlists.
pain_points: Feeling overwhelmed by too much information.
Frustration from not being able to register for desired events.
desired_outcomes: A sense of ease and satisfaction when navigating the website.
Confidence in my ability to participate in events.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: I feel relaxed and excited about attending events rather than stressed about registration.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I participate in community events, I want to be seen as an active and involved member, so I can build connections with others.
social_jobs.current_solution: Attending events and engaging with other members during activities.
pain_points: Limited visibility of event information can hinder participation.
Feeling disconnected if unable to register for events.
desired_outcomes: Recognition as an engaged community member.
Opportunities to connect with others in my demographic.
social_jobs.success_criteria: I receive positive feedback from peers about my involvement in community activities.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I explore the website, I want to quickly find information about membership benefits, so I can understand what I gain from being a member.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Reviewing the 'About Us' and 'Why Join' tabs, although they are not frequently accessed.
pain_points: Lack of clear and concise information about membership benefits.
Unnecessary complexity in navigation makes it hard to find relevant information.
desired_outcomes: Quick access to the key benefits of membership.
A straightforward understanding of why I should engage with the organization.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: I can easily recall the benefits of membership and feel motivated to participate in events.
